trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> objects that are used by data-bound controls such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据绑定控件（如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />）使用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects used by data-bound controls to specify how their child controls are presented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>类表示的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>对象数据绑定控件用于指定及其子控件的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> class derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>, an abstract base collection class used specifically to store <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>，专门用于存储非抽象基集合类<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> object influences the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>对象产生影响的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects that are dynamically added to the collection will be re-added to the control when state is restored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> 当还原状态时，将重新添加到该控件动态添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: This means that a field needs to be added, removed, or changed just once instead of on each postback, as most collection types in ASP.NET require.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，字段需要添加、 删除，或在每个回发时，只需一次更改而不是因为在 ASP.NET 中的大多数集合类型要求。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface, which enables it to store its state in ASP.NET view state.
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>类实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>接口，使它能够在 ASP.NET 视图状态中存储其状态。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> class to programmatically manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>类以编程方式管理一套<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is more common to define these fields declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，更常见的是以声明方式定义这些字段。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, and remove <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects using the appropriate methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加、 插入和删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>对象使用的适当方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects from a collection, use one of following methods:
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>对象从一个集合，使用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object from the collection using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器获取单个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>中使用数组表示法的集合对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-实现的对象，用于从集合中获取项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>属性在集合中，指定的项总数和通常用于确定集合中的上限。

trans-unit.source: You can add items to and remove items from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 可以将项添加到，还可以移除项的集合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects that are automatically created (for example, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is `true`) are not stored in the publicly accessible fields collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>自动创建的对象 (例如，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性是`true`) 不会存储在可公开访问的字段集合。

trans-unit.source: You can only access and manipulate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects that are not automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 你仅可以访问和处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>不会自动生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different data control field classes and how they are used.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的数据控件字段类以及如何使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Parameter Class
trans-unit.target: 参数类

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The abstract base class for all fields.
trans-unit.target: 类的抽象基类的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that is used to bind to text or data retrieved from an ASP.NET data source control.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据绑定控件字段，用于将绑定到文本或从 ASP.NET 数据源控件中检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that encapsulates general button functionality.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件字段，它封装常规按钮功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> are derived from it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>派生自它。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays at least one button.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件字段，它显示了至少一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示的数据绑定控件字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays actions that can be performed on the data displayed by the row (or column), such as edit, update, or delete.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据绑定控件字段，可以对所显示的行 （或列），如数据执行的显示操作编辑、 更新或删除。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示的数据绑定控件字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示的数据绑定控件字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容的数据绑定控件字段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to append to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 追加到集合末尾的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象追加到集合末尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A> method to append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A>方法要追加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method takes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object specified by the `field` parameter and appends it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此实现该方法采用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>指定对象`field`参数并将其追加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A> method to dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add%2A>方法将动态添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> that contains a copy of each data control field in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />，包含当前集合中的每一个数据控件字段的副本。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A> method to create a copy of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A>方法来创建当前集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by design-time dialog boxes to implement rollback behavior when an operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由设计时对话框用于实现回滚行为，取消操作时。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection contains a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 集合中是否包含特定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> contains the specified field; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 包含指定的字段，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行线性搜索。

trans-unit.source: It determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 它通过调用确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它是从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 从目标数组的指定索引处开始，将整个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 集合复制到兼容的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of fields in the source <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 源 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 集合中的字段数大于从 <paramref name="index" /> 到目标数组末尾处的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the fields in the collection change, usually as the result of a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况发生在集合中的字段更改时，通常是由于 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Add(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> 方法调用的结果。

trans-unit.source: This event is also raised anytime a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> in the collection raises its <see langword="FieldChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 引发 <see langword="FieldChanged" /> 事件的任何时候，也会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.FieldsChanged>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Insert%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Remove%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中查找的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中特定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <paramref name="field" /> parameter, if it is found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="field" /> 参数在集合中，则为它的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象插入到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 集合中的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中检索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位于集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>使用数组表示法的指定索引处的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Item%2A> indexer to access the fields of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the user clicks a button in the control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.Item%2A>索引器以访问的字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当用户单击控件中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object at the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> 对象。
